referred to a dietitian who can 
give you advice on how to get

More information
For further information, visit:
• pha.site/vegetarian-diet
• pha.site/vegan-diet
Healthy snacks
You	may	find	that	you	get	
hungry between meals. Avoid 
snacks that are high in fat and/
or sugar. Instead you could try:
• fresh fruit;
• sandwiches or pitta bread 
filled	with	grated	cheese,	
lean ham, mashed tuna, 
salmon or sardines and
